languages.text: "Алый, черный, синий и серый... Все смешалось в уродливый грязный вихрь. Ярость и отчаяние отравили отсек".
"Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."
languages.original_text: "Алый, черный, синий и серый... Все смешалось в уродливый грязный вихрь. Ярость и отчаяние отравили отсек".

traits.locale_text: "Crimson, black, blue, grey... All has become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."
"Crimson, black, blue, grey... All has become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."

"Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."

languages.text: "Rot, Schwarz, Azurblau, Grau ... Es ist alles zu einem hässlichen Wirbel aus Schlamm verkommen. Zorn und Verzweiflung haben das Modul vergiftet."
languages.original_text: "Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."

traits.locale_text: "Rot, Schwarz, Azurblau, Grau ... Es ist alles zu einem hässlichen Wirbel aus Schlamm verkommen. Zorn und Verzweiflung haben das Modul vergiftet."

languages.text: « Écarlate, noir, bleu, gris... Tout se confond en un méchant tourbillon de mélasse. La rage et le désespoir ont empoisonné le compartiment. »
languages.original_text: "Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."

traits.locale_text: « Écarlate, noir, bleu, gris... Tout se confond en un méchant tourbillon de mélasse. La rage et le désespoir ont empoisonné le compartiment. »

languages.text: «Carmesí, negro, celeste, gris... Todo se ha convertido en un torbellino de mugre asquerosa. La furia y la desesperación consumen la bahía».
languages.original_text: "Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."

traits.locale_text: «Carmesí, negro, celeste, gris... Todo se ha convertido en un torbellino de mugre asquerosa. La furia y la desesperación consumen la bahía».

languages.text: 「真紅、黒、セルリアン、灰色…すべてが醜いホワールウィンドと化しました。怒りと絶望が湾を毒しています」
languages.original_text: "Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."

traits.locale_text: 「真紅、黒、セルリアン、灰色…すべてが醜いホワールウィンドと化しました。怒りと絶望が湾を毒しています」

languages.text: “深红色、黑色、天蓝色、灰色……一切都变成了丑恶的旋风，仿佛污泥一样。愤怒与绝望已经毒害了这片甲板。”
languages.original_text: "Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."

traits.locale_text: “深红色、黑色、天蓝色、灰色……一切都变成了丑恶的旋风，仿佛污泥一样。愤怒与绝望已经毒害了这片甲板。”

languages.original_text: "Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."

languages.text: "Kan kızılı, siyah, gök mavisi, gri... Hepsi nahoş bir kasırgaya kapılarak çamura dönmüş. Öfke ve çaresizlik, bölmeyi zehirlemiş."
languages.original_text: "Crimson, black, cerulean, grey... It has all become an ugly whirlwind of muck. Rage and despair have poisoned the bay."
